lines: 1. Nyasaye nomiyo Adam Jakony e puoth Eden;To pod oyie ni dhano Mond` okonyre kama.
2. Nikech wachni maduong` to dichwo nowe jonyuol;Ni mond` odag gi chiege; Ginibedi kachiel.
3. Yesu nohero joge Nyaka nochiwore;Chwo mondo giher mondgi gi hera ma kama.
4. Kanisa to owinjo Weche duto mag Ruoth;Ka mon winjo chwogi, Winjruok nitie maber.
5. Muya maler, wasayi Bedi machiegini;Konyruok moro to onge mak In mibet kodwa.
6. Owetewa ariyo mochungo nyimi ka,Riw chunygi chutho koro gi hera mosiko.
7. Kumako yo me nyimu mad Nyasaye ogwedhu;Morne gi kuwe madieri obed kodu pile.
